basic.description: Time estimates for arithmetic and elementary number theory algorithms (division algorithm, Euclidean algorithm, congruences), modular arithmetic, finite fields, quadratic residues. Simple cryptographic systems; public key, RSA. Primality and factoring: pseudoprimes, Pollard's rho-method, index calculus. Elliptic curve cryptography.
basic.subject: MTHE
basic.title: Number Theory & Cryptography

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: MATH 210 or MATH 212 or MTHE 217 or MATH 217 or MATH 211 with permission of the instructor. Must also be registered in BSCE.
